name: Beowulf: The Game
description: Based on the upcoming movie by Robert Zemeckis, you are Beowulf, legendary Norse warrior with the strength of thirty men – arrogant, carnal, self-serving and lustful for gold and glory. You journey to Denmark to destroy a blood-thirsty beast that is wreaking havoc on the frigid land. But the evil persists, and you succumb to its promise of easy power, propelling yourself onto the Danish Throne.
